title: Add Enter key navigation from Fat to SNF field

requirements.summary: Enable Enter key press on the Fat input field to move focus to the SNF input field in the milk collection form
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Enter while focused on the Fat field moves focus to the SNF field
The navigation works consistently with existing Enter key patterns in the form

file_operations.description: Add onKeyDown handler to the Fat input field that listens for Enter key press and programmatically moves focus to the SNF input field using a ref, maintaining consistency with the existing Enter key navigation pattern from Farmer ID to Quantity and Quantity to Fat
